org.conqat.lib.commons.datamining

Class RecommenderRatingDatabase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.datamining.RecommenderRatingDatabase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RecommenderRatingDatabase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Binary rating database. A rating is either 'like' or 'unrated'.
    See Also:
